levels.description:
The next attack grants <$ba.camou>Camouflage</> and <@ba.vup>{HP_RECOVERY_PER_SEC}</> HP recovery per second to a nearby ally unit with less than 50% HP, lasting for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds (will not use on an ally unit already under the same effect)
<@ba.rem>Can store {cnt} charge(s)</>

The next attack grants <$ba.camou>Camouflage</> and <@ba.vup>{HP_RECOVERY_PER_SEC}</> HP recovery per second to a nearby ally unit with less than 50% HP, lasting for <@ba.vup>{duration}</> seconds (will not use on an ally unit already under the same effect)
